InspirationDef.label: induce withdrawal
InspirationDef.beginLetter: {0} has glimpsed the Dark God and received a commandment! Through the vision, [PAWN_pronoun] realized that only by wallowing in the agony of withdrawal symptoms of a drug can [PAWN_pronoun] be freed of sinful joy.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] is hyper-fixated on this revelation, and will collapse into a binge of drugs and deep despair if [PAWN_pronoun] cannot experience a full day of withdrawal symptoms within the next quadrum.
InspirationDef.baseInspectLine: Inspired: Wants to experience chemical withdrawal

InspirationDef.label: kinslayer
InspirationDef.beginLetter: {0} has glimpsed the Dark God and received a commandment! Through the vision, [PAWN_pronoun] saw blood - the blood of [PAWN_possessive] kin - flowing like a river to a sea of black nothingness.\n\nShaken by the revelation, [PAWN_pronoun] is convinced that [PAWN_pronoun] must send a member of [PAWN_possessive] bloodline into the embrace of the void personally. Should [PAWN_pronoun] fail to do so, a mindless rage of murderous intent will overcome [PAWN_objective] as despair sets in.

InspirationDef.label: vow of silence
InspirationDef.beginLetter: {0} has glimpsed the Dark God and received a commandment! [PAWN_pronoun] saw a vision... but could hear nothing at all. It was a vision in which life continued without a single, wretched, vile, unconsciable, aggravating, damnable noise was to be made. It was majestic.\n\nEnthralled by the beauty of the silence in the revelation, [PAWN_pronoun] refuses to speak and has become completely silent. The world will continue its horrific cacophany around [PAWN_objective], but [PAWN_pronoun] will not contribute to it... for a year. True silence can only be achieved when the last heretic is found and made to beg and plead for the Dark God's mercy, and this will require noise.

InspirationDef.label: embrace scarcity
InspirationDef.beginLetter: {0} has glimpsed the Dark God and received a commandment! In a vision of a world beautifully bereft of life, [PAWN_pronoun] realized there can be no place for abundance in it - and so [PAWN_pronoun] must reject it and instead embrace scarcity in its entirety.\n\n[PAWN_possessive] obsession can only be satisfied by fasting and plunging into fervent madness. Should [PAWN_possessive] fail to achieve this in time, [PAWN_pronoun] will suffer a catastrophic mental sublimation and flee from the colony... or simply perish if unable to.
InspirationDef.baseInspectLine: Inspired: Must fast and experience madness

InspirationDef.label: burn in light
InspirationDef.beginLetter: {0} has glimpsed the Dark God and received a commandment! The vision was of blinding light, extended suffering, and endless waves of roiling flame that engulfed the world in its horrible luminosity.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] knows that [PAWN_pronoun] must be a bulwark against this vile heresy and withstand the agony of light. [PAWN_pronoun] must spend no more than ten percent of the next ten days in darkness to endure this trial. Should [PAWN_possessive] shy away from the challenge, [PAWN_pronoun] will be crippled by diffidence in [PAWN_possessive] skills and beset by terrible despair.

InspirationDef.label: seek repentance
InspirationDef.beginLetter: {0} has glimpsed the Dark God and received a commandment! [PAWN_pronoun] witnessed himself standing before a set of trials to be faced and defeated with the utmost vigor.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] must search for these trials in the pits of madness and pluck these divine mandates from the clutches of insanity. Two ambitions must be completed, or else [PAWN_pronoun] will be forced to search for these trials elsewhere... either away from the colony or in death.

InspirationDef.label: seek repentance
InspirationDef.beginLetter: {0} has glimpsed the Dark God and received a commandment! [PAWN_pronoun] bore witness to a realm beyond all things - indeed, beyond the very concept of things existing. This must be the realm of the Dark God.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] must answer the summons. [PAWN_pronoun] must die. [PAWN_pronoun] must listen. [PAWN_pronoun] must return.
